OUT.description: Print arg2 as arg1(type: 0(str), 1(char), 2(dec - arg2 is count of bytes))

SET.description: Set variable into memory. Arg1 is 1 byte of how many next bytes should be the value

SUM.description: Sum two numbers and arg1 is destination. Args are addreses

SUB.description: Substract two numbers and arg1 is destination. Args are addreses

CPY.description: Copy arg1 bytes of arg3 into arg2
